publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1597 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Victim Notification Scheme (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Victim Notification Scheme (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
